88887.「……タッツィ ディエゴ サリアス。\n 大切な話を しますから\n ３人とも:
Tazzi, Diego, Sarias... I have something very
important that I need to discuss with the
three of you.

88888.「未熟だった あなたたちも\n <cs_pchero>さんのおかげで\n ひと回:
Though you are all inexperienced yourselves,
with <cs_pchero>'s help you were able
to undergo significant growth.

88889.「私は これから\n <cs_pchero>さんの 最終試練のために\n 案内役:
And now, I am about to guide them through
their final trial.

88890.「……さあ あなたたちも 一緒に来なさい。\n そこで <cs_pchero>さ:
I'd like you all to join me. It is there that
you will witness their trial, and learn the
meaning of their strength.

88891.「さて お待たせしました。\n さっそく 試練の場へ 向かいましょう！:
I appreciate your patience. Let's make our
way to the trial!

88892.「……それにしても 感慨深いですね。\n はじめて あなたを お見かけした時は\:
But still, you've deeply moved me. When I
first saw you, I did not think you would be
able to reach this level.

88893.「今回は あなたの実力に 敬意を表し\n 少しばかり 本気を出させていただきます:
So this time, out of respect for the level of your abilities...I'm going to get a bit more serious. You'd do well not to let your guard
down.

88894.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔物よ…… \n 我が召喚に応え 今 ここに来たれ！:
Monster from another world who lurks
deep within the abyss... Answer my summon
and show yourself!

88895.「おや……おどろかれましたか？\n この子は いざという時のために \n 用意し:
Oh? Surprised, are we? This little one is
very important to me. I have prepared him
for times of emergency.

88896.「それでは……最終試練 はじめっ！: And with that... Let the final trial begin!

88897.「……前の戦いでは 私の秘蔵っ子の外見に\n 油断されたようですね……。\n 今:
...it seems his outward appearance threw you
off guard during your last battle. Go on, show
me what you can do this time.

88898.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔物よ…… \n 我が召喚に応え 今 ここに来たれ！:
Monster from another world who lurks
deep within the abyss... Answer my summon
and show yourself!

88899.「それでは……最終試練 はじめっ！: And with that... Let the final trial begin!

88900.「なんということでしょう……。\n 私の秘蔵っ子さえも やすやすと倒すとは\n:
What strength... You even managed to defeat
my prized pupil. It seems I underestimated
your true power.

88901.「これほど たやすく乗り越えられては\n とても 最終試練とは 言えません。:
But this could hardly be called a final trial
if it were so easily overcome.

88902.「……ですが こういった事態を予測して\n 今回の試練には 続きを ご用意してい:
...that is why I have prepared something in
anticipation of such a scenario.

88903.「さあ……タッツィ ディエゴ サリアス。\n これは あなたたちにとっても修行の:
Now... Tazzi, Diego, Sarias...
This is part of your training. I want you to
give it everything you've got!

88906.「今回は 正々堂々\n 戦わせていただきます！: This time we shall fight fair and square!

88907.「さあ <cs_pchero>さん。\n 私たち 全員がお相手いたします！\n:
Come, <cs_pchero>!
You must now face all of us at once! Defeat
every monster in spectacular fashion!

88909.「もう これ以上 私から あなたに\n 与えるべき試練は ありません。\n これ:
There are no more trials that I can offer
you. With this, the lesson is complete.

88910.「……それに引きかえ あなたたちの\n 戦いぶりは いったい なんですか。:
...On the other hand, I have some questions
about the way you all fight.

88911.「こんな結果では 当分 卒業は認められません。\n 罰として 追加の修練を課しま:
With these results, it'll be some time before
you'll be able to graduate. Any additional
trials will be imposed as a punishment.

88915.「……あなたには 話しておきましょう。\n じつは 彼ら３人の真の姿は\n 戦い:
Actually... The true forms of these three are
that of ancient spirits that govern the ways
of battle.

88916.「旧い友人の頼みで そのチカラをきたえるべく\n あえて 人の姿に身を変えさせて:
At the request of an old friend, they chose to
take on human forms to nurture their power and
have endured long days of training.

88917.「……あなたの この最終試練は\n 彼らの修練としても きっと役立つものと思い\:
...I believed that your final trial would
surely be beneficial for their training as
well, so I decided to let them participate.

88918.「彼らのことは いつか訪れる\n 大いなる闇の根源との 対決にそなえて\n 今後:
I will continue to nurture them in preparation
of the inevitable confrontation with the Great
Source of Darkness.

88919.「時が来れば あなたとも 手を取り合い\n 共に 戦うことが あるかもしれません:
We may fight hand in hand when that time
comes. I hope I can count on your cooperation
when it does.

88920.「……さて。お約束した通り 試練に打ち勝った\n あなたの スキルポイントの割り:
Now, as promised, I will now allow you to
allocate up to 150 skill points for completing
this trial.

88921.「上限の解放は ダーマ神殿で おこないます。\n さあ みんなも 帰りますよ。:
I can do that for you back at the Abbey.
Come, everyone. Let us return.
